paper_abstract: In this paper, we present a max-plus algebraic modeling and control approach for cyclically operated high-throughput screening plants. In previous work an algorithm has been developed to determine the globally optimal solution of the cyclic scheduling problem. The obtained optimal schedule is modeled in a max-plus algebraic framework. The max-plus algebraic model can then be used to generate appropriate control actions to handle unexpected deviations from the predetermined cyclic operation during runtime. (C) 2010 Elsevier Ltd. paper_title: Modeling and control of high-throughput screening systems in a max-plus algebraic setting
